title: Long-Term Load Forecasting for Resource Planning
description: A resource planner needs a 20-year load forecast for the service territory to inform decisions about building new power plants.

tasks.description: Gather long-term economic forecasts for the region, including population growth and business development.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner compiles key economic driver data.

tasks.description: Forecast the adoption rate of disruptive technologies like rooftop solar, electric vehicles, and energy efficiency measures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner generates adoption curves for key technologies.

tasks.description: Combine the economic and technology forecasts into an integrated long-term energy forecast.
tasks.expected_outcome: System produces a 20-year forecast for both peak demand and annual energy consumption.
